about_us.title: About Remalux
about_us.description: LLP 'K-COLOR' under the trademark 'REMALUX' is a leader in the production of paints and coatings, located in the Republic of Kazakhstan. We offer consumers a wide range of high-quality paints, produced under British license from raw materials of well-known French, Belgian, German, Dutch, and American manufacturers.
